nodes.text: Kahesh, also known as the Reborn, was a male Sith who was part of the Infernal Council, a group of Sith enslaved by the Rakata warlord Soa and imprisoned with him in the Eternity Vault on the planet Belsavis.
Kahesh first appeared in Eternity Vault Operation in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a 2011 massively multiplayer online roleplaying vieogame released by BioWare.
